commit message: Fix locale dependent header showing in disk usage stats.
Rely more on exit status when searching vcgencmd location. Should fix #109

Use Context.getExternalFilesDir() for storage location of log file.
This way permission WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE isn't needed on API > 18. So no need to ask for permission on Marshmallow (#110).
Specify latest targetSdk for file-explorer library.
